page.title: 03Clubs in Langtoft
page.content: Langtoft has got a number of clubs. {Langtoft Ladies}has 20 members.It meets in the Church Rooms on the first Tuesday in every month.They have talks and outings.{Darby and Joan}have 29 members.They meet every Wednesday afternoon in the Sunday School Room. Langtoft has a{Keep Fit Club.}It meets every Wednesday morning in the Church Rooms.The Public House in Langtoft is called THE SHIP.The{mens' and ladies' {darts teams}play matches every fortnight in THE SHIP.We have a{Youth {Club}held every Wednesday night whose leader is Mr.Iredale.It is held in the school.They have numerous activities including snooker,table tennis and badminton.It starts at six thirty and finishes at nine o'clock.Langtoft {Football Club}has 13 members.It plays in the Driffield & District league.
